exceptions.exn: In environment b : bool lb : list bool The term "bool" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "list ?A".

original: destruct lb. - right. exists O. reflexivity. - left. destruct (destruct_list bool lb). + destruct s as [b [tl' H]]. left. exists (S O), tl'. rewrite H. reflexivity. + contradiction.
